member.name: CLASS_MEDIA_CHANGE_CONTEXT
member.summary: Contains information associated with a media change event.

member.name: CLASS_MEDIA_CHANGE_CONTEXT.MediaChangeCount
member.summary: The number of times that media has been changed since system startup.

summary.para: The state information. This member can be one of the following values from theMEDIA_CHANGE_DETECTION_STATE enumeration type.
